title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta with garlic until crisp; remove garlic.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan and pepper in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserve some pasta water.
Combine pasta with pancetta, remove from heat, toss with egg mixture.
Loosen with pasta water if needed and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-sear chicken until lightly charred.
Saut√© onions with spices; add tomato puree and simmer.
Stir in cream and add chicken back to sauce.
Simmer 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted sourdough topped with smashed avocado, chili flakes, and lemon.
instructions: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread on toast and sprinkle chili flakes.
Optional: top with poached egg.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Quick stir-fried beef with colorful veggies in a savory sauce.
instructions: Toss beef with soy, cornstarch, and a pinch of sugar.
Stir-fry beef until browned; remove.
Stir-fry vegetables with garlic until crisp-tender.
Return beef, add oyster sauce, and toss to coat.
Serve hot with steamed rice.
